doc.description: 普通投诉 A折线图——B饼图

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_1_CLD_A.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ acpt_time AS mon, count(1) AS value /*COUNT*/ FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY acpt_time order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time ,value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_1_CLD_B.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT substr(name,instr(name,'→',-1,2)+1) name,count(1) AS value FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY name order by value Desc ) where rownum<11 order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_1_CLD_C.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT area_name,count(1) AS value FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY area_name order by value Desc ) order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_3_CLD_A.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT acpt_time AS mon ,count(1) AS value FROM (SELECT CALLING_NUM AS phone,a12 AS name, area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT acpt_num AS phone ,SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) GROUP BY acpt_time) WHERE value >1 order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_3_CLD_B.query
sqlquery.select:
select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT name,count(1) AS value FROM (SELECT CALLING_NUM AS phone,a12 AS name, area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT acpt_num AS phone ,SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) GROUP BY name) WHERE value >1 order by value Desc ) where rownum<11 order by/*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_3_CLD_C.query
sqlquery.select:
select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT area_name,count(1) AS value FROM (SELECT area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) where 1=1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY area_name) WHERE value >1 order by value Desc ) order by/*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_6_CLD_A.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT acpt_time AS mon ,count(1) AS value FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT where 1=1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY acpt_time,name) WHERE value > 500 order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_6_CLD_B.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT name,count(1) AS value,acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT where 1=1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY name,acpt_time) WHERE value > 500 order by value Desc ) where rownum<11 order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_6_CLD_C.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT count(1) AS value,AREA_NAME FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT where 1=1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY AREA_NAME) WHERE value > 500 order by value Desc ) order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

SELECT/*COUNT*/ acpt_time AS mon, count(1) AS value /*COUNT*/ FROM (SELECT ACPT_CHNL_ID_NAME AS name , area_name, to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT ACPT_CHNL_NM AS name, area_name, to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) WHERE 1=1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY acpt_time order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time, value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_59_CLD_A.query

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_66_CLD_A.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ acpt_time AS mon,count(1) AS value/*COUNT*/ FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE ( name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%'
OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' )$customwhere$ GROUP BY acpt_time order by /*ORDERBY*/acpt_time, value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_66_CLD_B.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT name,count(1) AS value FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE ( name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%'
OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' ) $customwhere$ GROUP BY name order by value Desc ) where rownum<11 order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_66_CLD_C.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT area_name,count(1) AS value FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE ( name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%'
OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' ) $customwhere$ GROUP BY area_name order by value Desc ) order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/
